org.openstreetmap.josm.plugins.mapillary.history

Class MapillaryRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openstreetmap.josm.plugins.mapillary.history.MapillaryRecord

  • public class MapillaryRecord
extends java.lang.Object
    History record system in order to let the user undo and redo commands.
